wikipedia_page.main: Alex Lusty (born 9 April 1973) is an English rapper.

response: In 2011, Happy Martyr was formed with rapper Alex Lusty. The plan was to record some acoustic, stripped-down hip-hop, which Boorer described as "an MC fronting early Tyrannosaurus Rex". The albums One Square Mile and Nothing Like Love were released in 2012 and 2014 respectively.
* The OneThree (Alex Lusty and Boz Boorer)
